;########################  TATW 3.2  ########################

;###################### CORE BUILDINGS ######################
;######################### STABLES ##########################
;######################### BARRACKS  ########################
;########################## MISSILES ########################
;######################  TROLL CAGES  #######################
;################  MUMAKIL TRAINING GROUND  #################
;#########################  SIEGE  ##########################
;#########################  SMITHS  #########################
;########################  ECONOMY  #########################

;#######################  PALANTIRI  ########################
;#####################  INFO BUILDINGS  #####################
;############################################################

;------------------------------------------------------------------------
;--- Unit availability --------------------------------------------------
;------------------------------------------------------------------------
;Elves
;1.0	and hidden_resource forest
;0.5	and hidden_resource grasland
;0.25	and hidden_resource mountains or hidden_resource desert
;
;Dwarves
;1.0	and hidden_resource mountains
;0.33	and hidden_resource forest or hidden_resource grasland
;0.25	and hidden_resource desert
;
;Humans
;1.0	and hidden_resource grasland
;0.5	and hidden_resource forest
;0.25	and hidden_resource desert or hidden_resource mountains
;
;Humans evil
;1.0	and hidden_resource desert or hidden_resource grasland
;0.5	and hidden_resource forest or hidden_resource mountains
;
;Evil
;1.0	 and hidden_resource mountains
;0.75	 and hidden_resource grasland
;0.5	 and hidden_resource forest or hidden_resource desert
;
;------------------------------------------------------------------------
;--- Population growth --------------------------------------------------
;------------------------------------------------------------------------
;Elves
;Guild:		and hidden_resource forest		population_growth_bonus bonus 1-3
;
;Dwarves
;Mines:		and hidden_resource silver gold iron	population_growth_bonus bonus 1-3
;
;Humans
;Breed:		and hidden_resource grasland		population_growth_bonus bonus 1-3
;
;Humans evil
;Trade Posts:	and hidden_resource desert		population_growth_bonus bonus 1-3
;
;Evil
;Temples:	and hidden_resource mountains/grasland	population_growth_bonus bonus 1-2
;
;
;------------------------------------------------------------------------
;--- Cultural conversion ------------------------------------------------
;------------------------------------------------------------------------
;

hidden_resources   big_city towers mountains forest desert grasland roads coast earls gwaith greenway osgiliath_west osgiliath_east annuminas dale_rivers rhovanion rivendell mithlond lindon moria bree shire isengard blackroot pelargir dunland dunedain hobbits riddermark edoras hornburg fold amroth lossarnach minas_tirith ithilien erebor grey_mountains horses trolls mumakil hr_none crusade jihad horde_target atlantic no_pirates no_brigands

;############################################################
;###################### CORE BUILDINGS ######################
;############################################################
building core_building
{
;    convert_to core_castle_building
    levels wooden_pallisade wooden_wall stone_wall large_stone_wall huge_stone_wall 
    {
        wooden_pallisade city requires factions { gondor, northern_european, mesoamerican, middle_eastern, eastern_european, greek, southern_european, }
        {
            capability
            {
                wall_level 0
                tower_level 1
                free_upkeep bonus 2
                recruitment_slots 1
		recruits_morale_bonus bonus 2 requires event_counter is_the_ai 1
		law_bonus bonus 8 requires event_counter is_the_ai 1

		construction_cost_bonus_stone bonus 50 requires event_counter is_the_ai 1
		construction_cost_bonus_wooden bonus 50 requires event_counter is_the_ai 1
		taxable_income_bonus 50 requires event_counter is_the_ai 1			;used only for correct display of construction bonus
		trade_base_income_bonus bonus 1 requires event_counter is_the_ai 1
trade_base_income_bonus bonus 1
               recruit_pool "Goblin Orcs"  1   0.01   4  0  requires factions { hre, }  and region_religion catholic 33
            }
            material wooden
            construction  3 
            cost  1000
            settlement_min village
            upgrades
            {
                wooden_wall
            }
        }
        wooden_wall city requires factions { gondor, northern_european, mesoamerican, middle_eastern, eastern_european, greek, southern_european, }
        {

building core_castle_building
{
;    convert_to core_building
    levels motte_and_bailey wooden_castle castle fortress citadel 
    {
        motte_and_bailey castle requires factions { gondor, northern_european, mesoamerican, middle_eastern, eastern_european, greek, southern_european, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                wall_level 0
                tower_level 1
                free_upkeep bonus 3
                recruitment_slots 1
		recruits_morale_bonus bonus 2 requires event_counter is_the_ai 1
		law_bonus bonus 8 requires event_counter is_the_ai 1
		;income_bonus bonus 100 requires event_counter is_the_ai 1
		construction_cost_bonus_stone bonus 50 requires event_counter is_the_ai 1
		construction_cost_bonus_wooden bonus 50 requires event_counter is_the_ai 1
		taxable_income_bonus 50 requires event_counter is_the_ai 1			;used only for correct display of construction bonus
		trade_base_income_bonus bonus 1 requires event_counter is_the_ai 1
                happiness_bonus bonus 1 
trade_base_income_bonus bonus 1

building tower
{
    convert_to castle_tower
    levels ballista_towers cannon_towers 
    {
        ballista_towers city requires factions { sicily, milan, scotland, turks, byzantium, spain, venice, england, france, hre, portugal, egypt, mongols, moors, }  and hidden_resource towers
        {
            convert_to 0
            capability
            {
                tower_level 2
trade_base_income_bonus bonus 1
            }
            material stone
            construction  4 
            cost  4500 
            settlement_min large_city
            upgrades
            {
                cannon_towers
            }
        }
        cannon_towers city requires factions {  }
        {
            convert_to 1
            capability
            {
                tower_level 3
trade_base_income_bonus bonus 2
            }
            material stone
            construction  6 
            cost  8000 
            settlement_min huge_city
            upgrades
            {
            }
        }
    }
    plugins 
    {
    }
}
building castle_tower
{
    convert_to tower
    levels c_ballista_towers c_cannon_towers 
    {
        c_ballista_towers castle requires factions { sicily, milan, scotland, turks, byzantium, spain, venice, england, france, hre, portugal, egypt, mongols, moors, }  and hidden_resource towers
        {
            convert_to 0
            capability
            {
                tower_level 2
trade_base_income_bonus bonus 1
            }
            material stone
            construction  4 
            cost  4200 
            settlement_min city
            upgrades
            {
                c_cannon_towers
            }
        }
        c_cannon_towers castle requires factions {  }
        {
            convert_to 1
            capability
            {
                tower_level 3
trade_base_income_bonus bonus 2
            }
            material stone
            construction  6 
            cost  8000 
            settlement_min large_city
            upgrades
            {
            }
        }
    }
    plugins 
    {
    }
}

building equestrian
{
    convert_to c_equestrian
    levels stables knights_stables barons_stables earls_stables kings_stables 
    {
        stables castle requires factions { sicily, byzantium, milan, scotland, turks, spain, venice, france, hre, portugal, egypt, mongols, } 
        {
            convert_to 0
            capability
            {

                recruit_pool "Homeguard Cavalry"  0   0.06   2  0  requires factions { egypt, }  and region_religion orthodox 75 and hidden_resource forest

                recruit_pool "Silvan Horsearchers"  0   0.04   2  0  requires factions { mongols, }  and region_religion orthodox 50 and hidden_resource grasland

;############################################################
;########################## MISSILES ########################
;############################################################
building missiles
{
    convert_to c_missiles
    levels bowyer practice_range archery_range marksmans_range 
    {
        bowyer castle requires factions { sicily, byzantium, milan, scotland, turks, spain, venice, england, france, hre, portugal, egypt, mongols, moors, } 
        {
            convert_to 0
            capability
            {
trade_base_income_bonus bonus 1
                recruit_pool "Elf Archer2"  1   0.15   2  0  requires factions { egypt, }  and region_religion orthodox 33 and hidden_resource forest

;#########################  SIEGE  ##########################
;############################################################
building siege
{
    convert_to castle_siege
    levels ballista_range catapult_range siege_works 
    {
        ballista_range city requires factions { sicily, byzantium, milan, scotland, turks, spain, venice, england, france, hre, portugal, egypt, mongols, moors, }  and building_present_min_level barracks town_guard

building port
{
    convert_to castle_port
    levels port shipwright dockyard naval_drydock 
    {
        port city requires factions { sicily, byzantium, milan, scotland, turks, spain, venice, egypt, mongols, moors, } 
        {
            convert_to 0
            capability
            {
                recruit_pool "cog"  1   0.2   2  0  requires factions { sicily, scotland, turks, byzantium, }  and hidden_resource coast
                recruit_pool "longboat"  1   0.2   2  0  requires factions { milan, }  and hidden_resource coast
                recruit_pool "dhow"  1   0.2   2  0  requires factions { spain, venice, }  and hidden_resource coast
                recruit_pool "dromon"  1   0.2   2  0  requires factions { egypt, mongols, }  and hidden_resource coast
		trade_base_income_bonus bonus 1
                trade_fleet 1
trade_base_income_bonus bonus 2
            }
            material wooden
            construction  5
            cost  3500 
            settlement_min large_town
            upgrades
            {
                shipwright
            }
        }
        shipwright city requires factions { sicily, byzantium, milan, scotland, turks, spain, venice, egypt, mongols, moors, } 
        {
            convert_to 1
            capability

    religion northmen

                religion_level bonus 2

            }

            cost  1200 
            settlement_min village

                alchemy_school
            }
        }

            convert_to 1
            capability
            {
                religion_level bonus 3

            }
            material wooden

            cost  2500 
            settlement_min large_town

                university
            }
        }

        {
            capability
            {
                religion_level bonus 4

            }

            cost  5000

; GONDOR
; 
building gondor_academic
{

building taverns
{
    levels brothel inn tavern coaching_house pleasure_palace 
    {
        brothel city requires factions { sicily, byzantium, milan, scotland, turks, spain, venice, england, france, hre, portugal, egypt, mongols, moors, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                agent spy  0  requires factions { sicily, byzantium, milan, scotland, turks, } 
                agent spy  0  requires factions { spain, venice, } 
                agent spy  0  requires factions { england, france, hre, portugal, } 
                agent spy  0  requires factions { egypt, mongols, } 
                agent spy  0  requires factions { moors, } 
                agent_limit spy 1
trade_base_income_bonus bonus 1
            }
            material wooden
            construction  3
            cost  900 
            settlement_min town
            upgrades
            {
                inn
            }
        }
        inn city requires factions { sicily, byzantium, milan, scotland, turks, spain, venice, england, france, hre, portugal, egypt, mongols, moors, } 
        {
            capability
            {
                agent spy  0  requires factions { sicily, byzantium, milan, scotland, turks, } 
                agent assassin  0  requires factions { sicily, byzantium, milan, scotland, turks, }  and event_counter fellowship 0
                agent spy  0  requires factions { spain, venice, } 
                agent assassin  0  requires factions { spain, venice, }  and event_counter fellowship 0
                agent spy  0  requires factions { england, france, hre, portugal, } 
                agent assassin  0  requires factions { england, france, hre, portugal, }  and event_counter fellowship 0
                agent spy  0  requires factions { egypt, mongols, } 
                agent spy  0  requires factions { moors, } 
                agent assassin  0  requires factions { moors, }  and event_counter fellowship 0
                agent_limit assassin 1
                agent_limit spy 1
trade_base_income_bonus bonus 2
            }
            material wooden
            construction  4
            cost  2400 
            settlement_min large_town
            upgrades
            {
                tavern
            }
        }
        tavern city requires factions { sicily, byzantium, milan, scotland, turks, spain, venice, england, france, hre, portugal, egypt, mongols, moors, } 
        {
            capability

                agent spy  0  requires factions { sicily, byzantium, milan, scotland, turks, } 
                agent assassin  0  requires factions { sicily, byzantium, milan, scotland, turks, }  and event_counter fellowship 0
                agent spy  0  requires factions { spain, venice, } 
                agent assassin  0  requires factions { spain, venice, }  and event_counter fellowship 0
                agent spy  0  requires factions { england, france, hre, portugal, } 
                agent assassin  0  requires factions { england, france, hre, portugal, }  and event_counter fellowship 0

                agent spy  0  requires factions { moors, } 
                agent assassin  0  requires factions { moors, }  and event_counter fellowship 0
                happiness_bonus bonus 1
                agent_limit assassin 1
                agent_limit spy 1
trade_base_income_bonus bonus 3
            }
            material wooden
            construction  5
            cost  4800 
            settlement_min city

                coaching_house
            }
        }
        coaching_house city requires factions { sicily, byzantium, milan, scotland, turks, spain, venice, england, france, hre, portugal, egypt, mongols, moors, }

building tourney
{
